work.name: Information Security Consulting
work.summary: Lead CMMC Certified Assessor at a cybersecurity consulting firm specializing in Strategic Cybersecurity & Compliance Consulting, CMMC Gap Assessments, CMMC Readiness, and CMMC Mock Assessments. Responsible for go-to-market strategy, strategic partnerships, P&L ownership, and direct consulting with key clients.

work.name: Information Security Consulting
work.summary: Senior Manager at a cybersecurity consulting firm specializing in Strategic Cybersecurity & Compliance Consulting, Secure Enclave Implementation, and CMMC Gap Assessments. Responsible for go-to-market strategy, strategic partnerships, P&L ownership, and direct consulting with key clients.

work.name: Cybersecurity Assessment & Compliance
work.summary: Developed tools and resources to support junior consultants conducting CMMC assessments. Performed FedRAMP and CMMC assessments, including serving as lead assessor for CMMC certification engagements. Conducted readiness assessments for OSCs preparing for CMMC assessment. Collaborated with internal stakeholders to design components of an internal CMMC compliant environment addressing known deficiencies.

work.name: Managed Security Services Provider / Professional Services
work.summary: As a key member of the leadership team, leveraged extensive expertise in building and leading Cybersecurity teams to create a thriving business unit delivering fully managed Cybersecurity and compliance services to 13K end users. This team, consisting of 6 direct reports, was built entirely from the ground up and specializes in delivering positive Cybersecurity outcomes for clients with heightened security and compliance needs, including the Defense Industrial Base (CMMC, NIST 800-171, NIST 800-53), and Healthcare (HIPAA, HITRUST).
highlights: Guided clients through the complexities of compliance initiatives, including HIPAA, CMMC, and NIST 800-171. This includes a 1600+ user healthcare client where HITRUST was achieved and maintained through multiple assessment years.
Led the successful attainment of the CompTIA Trustmark+ certification for MSPs

work.name: Managed Security Services Provider / Professional Services
work.summary: Entrusted with the leadership of a diverse team of Information Security experts, overseeing internal and external facing operational objectives. This role was within a company generating $55M+ in revenue, serving over 1,000 clients, 80K end users, and managing 100,000+ endpoints.
highlights: Successfully cultivated and nurtured strategic partner alliances with industry leaders. Achieved the prestigious recognition of 'Global Partner of the Year' with a major revenue partner in just 18 months of partnership.
Led a team of Virtual Chief Information Security Officers (vCISOs) who provided senior-level Governance, Risk, and Compliance consulting
